meanings.definition: The act of fixing or restoring something to good condition.
meanings.sent1: Her repairing of the broken toy made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: The repairing of the old house took several weeks to complete.
meanings.sent3: The repairing of the leaky faucet turned into a family project.
meanings.sent4: His repairing of relationships was like weaving a tapestry of trust.
meanings.sent5: The repairing of the torn book cover was a delicate task requiring patience.

meanings.definition: The process of mending or making something whole again.
meanings.sent1: The repairing of the torn shirt was done with skillful stitches.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the repairing of the damaged roof began immediately.
meanings.sent3: The repairing of the broken vase involved a lot of super glue.
meanings.sent4: Her repairing of the friendship was like putting together a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The repairing of the cracked mirror reflected her attention to detail.
